## Core.Ids.normalize() function

Normalizes an optional supplied string, removing non-alphanumeric characters and forcing to lower case if a string is supplied. Returns `undefined` if input is undefined.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function normalize(from: string | undefined): string | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  from | string \| undefined | the <code>string</code> to be normalized |

**Returns:**

string \| undefined
